mapper.insert:
select review_seq.nextval from dual
insert into review(r_no, r_content, r_star_point, r_write_time, o_no, r_title, r_report, u_username, s_num) values(#{rNo}, #{rContent}, #{rStarPoint}, sysdate, #{oNo}, #{rTitle}, #{rReport}, #{uUsername}, #{sNum})
mapper.select: select * from review where r_no=#{rNo} and rowNum=1

select * from (select rownum as rnum, r.* from (select /* index_desc(review review_pk_rNo)*/r_no rNo, r_content rContent, r_star_point rStarPoint, r_write_time rWriteTime, o_no oNo, r_title rTitle, r_report rReport, u_username uUsername, s_num sNum) r where rownum <=#{endRowNum}) where rnum>=#{startRowNum}

select * from (select rownum as rnum, r.* from (select /* index_desc(review review_pk_sNum)*/r_no rNo, r_content rContent, r_star_point rStarPoint, r_write_time rWriteTime, o_no oNo, r_title rTitle, r_report rReport, u_username uUsername, s_num sNum from where review s_num=#{sNum}) r where rownum <=#{endRowNum}) where rnum>=#{startRowNum}
mapper.delete: delete from review where r_no=#{rNo } and rownum=1
